turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm wanting to get a Starbucks drink for pickup at the Starbucks on Clear Creek Clear Creek Road in Killeen.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to have a mango dragonfruit lemonade Starbucks Refresher.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'm going to go with a trenta iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a trenta iced mango dragonfruit lemonade refresher from the starbucks on silvercreek, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My mistake, the order will be sent to the starbucks on Clear creek and killean.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wonderfull. YOur order will be ready in 15 minutes.
